Items.Title: Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
INVOCATION - Delivered by: Reverend Dr. Robert M. Waterman, District Administrative Bishop who serves as a spiritual leader at Antioch Baptist Brooklyn Church, located at  828 Greene Avenue, Brooklyn NY, 11221.

Motion to spread the Invocation in full upon the record by Council Member Cornegy.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by Reverend Dr. Robert M. Waterman, District Administrative Bishop who serves as a spiritual leader at Antioch Baptist Brooklyn Church, located at  828 Greene Avenue, Brooklyn NY, 11221.

Council Member Cornegy moved to spread the Invocation in full upon the record.

Items.MinutesNote:
The presence of a quorum was announced by the Majority Leader and  Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Cumbo).

At the time of this Stated Meeting, there was one vacant seat in the Council (37th District, Brooklyn) pending the swearing-in of the certified winner of the November 3, 2020 General Election.


There were 50 Council Members considered present for the two separate proceedings of the Stated Meeting of June 30, 2020 which opened in the morning of June 30th and continued and concluded  with the later Recessed Meeting of June 30, 2020.


*Editor’s Note re: Attendance for the Stated Meeting of June 30, 2020 and the Recessed Meeting of June 30, 2020:  the Recessed Meeting held in the evening of  June 30, 2020 is considered to be the continuation and conclusion of this Stated Meeting that opened in the morning of June 30th.  For attendance purposes, therefore, any Council Member who was present at any one of these two meetings will be considered present for all of the proceedings known collectively as the Stated Meeting of June 30, 2020.  Although Council Member Eugene was absent from this Stated Meeting held in the morning of June 30th, he was subsequently considered as Present but Not Voting  for these morning proceedings due to his presence at the later Recessed Meeting held in the evening of June 30, 2020.
The Majority Leader (Council Member Cumbo) presiding as the Acting President Pro Tempore.
At this point the Speaker (Council Member Johnson) made the following announcements:
Whereupon on motion of the Speaker (Council Member Johnson), the Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Cumbo) recessed the meeting subject to call.

The Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Cumbo) put the question whether the Council would agree with and adopt such reports, which were decided in the affirmative by the following vote:

Items.Title: Passed The Consent Agenda
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that these files be approved by consent vote.
